Mazagway (Musgoy; nke a makwaara dị ka Mazagway-Hidi) bụ asụsụ Chadic a na-asụ na Cameroon, na North Province na Far North Province
Blench (2006) kewara ya dị ka olumba nke Daba.
A na-asụ Mazagway ma ọ bụ Mazagway Hidi na mpaghara Mousgoy na mpaghara ugwu nke Guider commune ( ngalaba Mayo-Louti, North Region) na n'ebe ndịda nke obodo Hina (Mayo-Tsanaga, Far North Region)
Ọ nwere njikọ chiri anya na Daba, nke a na-ewerebu dị ka olumba Mazagway.
